Search Website



Town Council
============

The regular meeting of the Town Council is scheduled for the **fourth Monday** of each month at 6:00 p.m.

Agendas will be posted **72 hours** in advance of meetings. Minutes will be posted upon approval.

View most recent Town Council Agendas & Minutes
